message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product that I know will be extremely valuable to your business. My asking price is $1,000,000. This reflects the significant value I know you'll derive from it. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. I'm interested in making a deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. This is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective, and I'm willing to be flexible. I'm prepared to come down to $950,000. This is still a great deal for you, considering the value you'll get out of the product. Let's work together to find a solution that benefits us both.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $925,000. This is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product, and I'm willing to make a decision soon.

Bob, I'm really trying to make this work for both of us. I'm willing to go down to $940,000. This is a fair price, considering the incredible value this product will bring to your business.  I'm confident we can close this deal quickly at this price.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $925,000, but I'm not willing to go any higher. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can close the deal at this price.
